name: Partnership
description: Finding the people who you're interested in collaborating with, who are active participants in their community.

name: Community involvement
description: Involving members of the community you're working with in the co-design process.

name: Co-design plan
description: Planning all that is needed for the co-design engagement to get off the ground.

name: Facilitation
description: Creating the environment and conditions for your co-designers to be able to participate and contribute.

name: Ideas and outcomes
description: Ideas and outcomes that result from the co-design sessions: How to document it, synthesize it, and also larger questions such as who owns these ideas.

name: Reflection
description: Taking the time to reflect on the process on what has gone well and what could be improved for next time.
